subject: Partnership enquiry — Social Trading Vlog (66K subs, 4.5M views, comparison content)
body:
Hi,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog — a YouTube channel and website dedicated to social trading and online investing.

I'm expanding my content beyond eToro to cover the wider trading platform landscape, and I believe there's a strong fit for a partnership with Trading 212.

My platform at a glance:

- YouTube: 66,400+ subscribers, 4.5 million total views across 335 videos
- Top video: 826,000+ views (retail trading and broker content)
- Website: socialtradingvlog.com — fully SEO-optimised with interactive comparison tools
- International audience: content in 6 languages reaching UK, European, and Middle Eastern markets
- Demographic: retail investors actively researching and comparing trading platforms
- Track record: nearly 10 years of consistent, real-money content creation (since 2016)

Trading 212 is already featured on my interactive platform comparison tool at socialtradingvlog.com/calculators/compare-platforms/, and I'm currently producing detailed comparison articles (including 'eToro vs Trading 212') that target high-intent search keywords.

My content focuses on honest, experience-based comparisons — which tends to convert well because viewers trust the recommendation. I never promote platforms I wouldn't use myself.

Given the scale and intent of my audience, I'd like to discuss your premium partnership tiers. I understand you work with select content creators on enhanced terms, and I believe my channel's size, niche focus, and content quality would qualify.

I'm particularly interested in:
- Your CPA rates for the Grow Big or Go Expert tiers
- Whether you offer hybrid CPA + revenue share arrangements
- Any content support or co-promotion opportunities

Happy to share analytics or jump on a call at your convenience.

Best regards,
Tom West
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
https://www.youtube.com/@SocialTradingVlog
